      • Charger

        public Charger(int id,
               ChargingStation station,
               java.lang.String kindOfCharging)
        Constructor of Charger class.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the Charger.
        station - The ChargingStation in which the Charger belongs.
        kindOfCharging - The kind of charging the Charger supports.

    • Method Detail

      • executeChargingEvent

        public final void executeChargingEvent(ChargingEvent ev)
        Executes the ChargingEvent. It lasts as much as ChargingEvent's charging time demands. The energy that the ChargingEvent needs is subtracted from the total energy of the ChargingStation. The mode of charging event gets 4. At the end if the automatic queue's handling is activated, the Charger checks the list.
        Parameters:
        ev - The ChargingEvent that is going to be executed.

      • changeSituation

        public final void changeSituation()
        Changes the situation of the Charger.

      • reBusy

        public final boolean reBusy()
        Returns the situation of the Charger.
        Returns:
        True if it is busy, false if it is not busy.

      • reKind

        public final java.lang.String reKind()
        Returns the kind of charging.
        Returns:
        The kind of charging the Charger supports.

      • setChargingEvent

        public final void setChargingEvent(ChargingEvent ev)
        Sets a ChargingEvent in the Charger.
        Parameters:
        ev - The ChargingEvent to be linked with the Charger.

      • handleQueueEvents

        public final void handleQueueEvents()
        Handles the list. It executes (if any) the first element of the list.

      • reChargingEvent

        public final ChargingEvent reChargingEvent()
        Returns the ChargingEvent of the Charger.
        Returns:
        The ChargingEvent which is linked with the Charger.

      • reCommitTime

        public final long reCommitTime()
        Returns the amount of time the Charger is going to be busy.
        Returns:
        The time that the Charger is going to be busy.

      • setCommitTime

        public final void setCommitTime(int time)
        Sets the time the Charger is going to be busy.
        Parameters:
        time - The commit time.

      • reId

        public final int reId()
        Returns the id of the Charger.
        Returns:
        The id of Charger.
